hints.content:
$\blue{40}$ tickets is the same as $\blue{4\text{ groups of ten}}$ tickets.

There were $\red6$ concerts.

Total number of tickets sold:  
$\begin{align}&\red6\times\blue{4\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\purple{24\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\purple{240}\end{align}$

question.content:

**How many tickets were sold in all?**
